title: AFK Players
body:
OCE should implement loss prevention for players that afk whole game!

For example, riven in the game i just had, didn't end up connecting to the game so it was a 4v5 from the start to the finish of the game.

This is where loss prevention should come into play.

Does OCE have loss prevention if so when is it used?

Anyone else's input would be great. :)

replies.body:
Or simply lock anyone who afk/dc out of rank games.

Each offenses, regardless of reason get 1 day ban, and add 12 hours on top for each repeat offenses.

3 AFK/DC within a month = 1 Month ban.

Brilliant.


But, of course, this dream like scenario will never happen.

Because, hey, it's not their fault that their ISP seemingly have trouble every 2nd week.
It's also not their fault that roommate/family member started torrenting. Right?

Just suck it up and accept that fact that "1 afk player outweigh 9 other players" under current system. If you got an afk/dc, just pretend that the person you played with just suffered a heart attack and died in front of his pc.

>If you got an afk/dc, just pretend that the person you played with just suffered a heart attack and died in front of his pc.

This is good advice. I'm following this.

Loss prevention is a button that Riot presses to make it so that all games currently in progress (across the entire server) will not result in a defeat. This is only done when there are severe issues with the servers that are affecting the majority of players. It is not a service that's applied on an individual basis.

It would be cool if it happened, but then it brings up the point: if you know that your game will be loss prevented because of an AFK player, then why would you bother playing that game at all? It would actively encourage everyone to leave a game when just one person leaves, which wouldn't result in many games actually being played. It's not fun to verse a team where all the players disconnect because of one disconnect.

would be good to get some sort of response to this. I have never seen loss prevented on this server, but I have seen it on NA before.

Cheers,
mugz
